Package pipeline

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IPipe<S,T>
    A pipe is a sink which processes the input data and pushes the result to the chained sink.
    ISink<T>
    A sink is an object which can receive data.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    APipe<S,T>
    An abstract implementation for IPipe.
    CastPipe<S,T>
    A pipe which cast the input of type S to an object of type T and emits it
    CompressPipe<S,T>
    A helper pipe which hides pipes between the input pipe and output pipe
    MergePipe<S,T>
    A pipe which synchronizes two sources and outputs a pair of results.
    SingleCachedSink<T>
    A simple sink which can only save one entry.
    SplitPipe<S,A,T>
    An abstract class which helps to implement a pipe which splits the input
